trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Albion
There was one other sighting in Albion on or around September 23rd 2003
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in the backyard of my mom's house watching the dogs when I noticed a 'large star' doing a serpentine motion. I went inside and grabbed a camera and got a clear picture of it. I do not remember when I lost sight of it. The object was amber in color and had a reflective surface. In the picture I took you can clearly see an oval shaped object in the same shot as the moon. I felt like I had seen an aircraft under intelligent control that I could not identify.
Summary: amber colored "jelly bean" doing a serpentine motion through the night sky.
